Name: The First Day
About the game: The First Day is an Indie First Person Puzzle Solving Game. It is your first work day at the soda company Paaraol. The place turns out to be very strange and isn't how it should be. Use your new abilities to change the gravitational pull of objects to solve puzzles. You will find several tools that are supporting you, like Boxes, Buttons, Lasers, Quantum Machines, Teleporters and more. Use and combine them to puzzle your way through the Paaraol-Company. All while you are going on a seamless journey to find the secrets behind your powers and battle your past. - 64 unique Puzzles - Change the gravitational pull of objects - A seamless journey with no loading screens after the intro - Walk on walls, floors and ceilings - Use and combine many tools while solving puzzles like: - Laser - Projections - Mirrors - Beamer - Floating Balls - Switches - Teleporter - Boxes - Laser Boxes - Portal Boxes - Turrets - Barriers - Freeze objects - NPCs
Meta Title: The First Day: Jun 7, 2019, The First Day and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on The First Day? Check out the release date (Jun 7, 2019), developer insights from The First Day, and a complete game summary.
